trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fernley
There were no other sightings in Fernley on or around July 25th 2009
Summary: BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT TRAVELING NW TO SE AT SPEED SLOWER THAN MOST PLANES. DISAPPEARED AND THEN REAPPEARED BRIEFLY TEN MINUTES LATER.
divs: sighting detailswe were lying on chaises in backyard facing to the south about 9:45pm when i noticed a bright white light traveling from the northwest to the southeast. the light crossed directly over us at an altitude of perhaps 2000 feet and was completely silent. the light continued traveling to the se and disappeared at a position of perhaps 10 or 11 o"clock relative to our position. the object's size would have been approximately 1\4 the size of a full moon. about ten minutes later the object reappeared in the sky to the east of us and appeared to make a turn to the south prior to disappearing. the speed of the object was similar to that of a small plane. after the second appearance of the object i felt rather uneasy and apprehensive about staying outside and went in the house. just prior to the reappearance my wife stated "i wish it would come back over."
